revision.text:
[[file:Steeky.jpg|thumb|Steeky Hox in {{TTGC|-}}]] '''Hoxes''' (Japanese: {{lang|ja|ホッグス}}, ''Hoggusu'') are a family of squirrel-like enemies in the {{XC|serieslink}}. They have no appearance change between games, and come in brown and white varieties.
== {{XC|-}} == They are commonly found on [[Bionis' Leg]], around [[Colony 6]], and on [[Valak Mountain]]. The strongest Hoxes are [[Dark Hox]]es at level 76, which reside on Bionis' Leg.
=== Normal Minor Enemies === * [[Dark Hox]] * [[Doom Hox]] * [[Easy Hox]] * [[Hard Hox (XC1)|Hard Hox]] * [[Morule Hox]] * [[Porcu Hox]] * [[Soft Hox]] * [[White Hox]]
=== Quest Exclusive Enemies === * [[Black Smoke Hox]] (During ''[[To Colony 6!]]'' and ''[[The Road Home]]'') * [[Lazy Hox]] (During ''[[A Selfish Girl's Mistake]]'') * [[White Smoke Hox]] (During ''To Colony 6!'' and ''The Road Home'')
=== Unique Monster === * [[Drifter Jutard]]
== {{XCFC|sub}} == === Normal Minor Enemies === * [[Doom Hox]] ([[Fogbeast]]) * [[Morule Hox]]
== {{XC2|-}} == === Normal Minor Enemies === * [[Mogen Hox]] * [[Zaguin Hox]]
== {{TTGC|-}} == === Normal Minor Enemy === * [[Steeky Hox]]
== {{XC3|-}} == === Normal Minor Enemies === * [[Alderra Hox]] * [[Hard Hox (XC3)|Hard Hox]] * [[Knuckle Hox]] * [[Nairoo Hox]] * [[Plane Hox]] * [[Ragora Hox]] * [[Ruffian Hox]] * [[Varran Hox]]
=== Unique Monsters === * [[Farseer Pirtett]] * [[Gallivanter Buckley]]

{{for|the Accessory in {{XC2|-}}|Ice Headband (XC2)}}
|-|Common = {{Infobox item |name = Ice Headband |image = XC3 Accessory Cap.png |caption = Boosts Critical Rate by 20%. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Common |source = |sell = 2330 [[Gold|G]] }} |-|Rare = {{Infobox item |name = Ice Headband |image = XC3 Accessory Cap.png |caption = Boosts Critical Rate by 22%. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Rare |source = |sell = 2330 [[Gold|G]] }} |-|Legendary = {{Infobox item |name = Ice Headband |image = XC3 Accessory Cap.png |caption = Boosts Critical Rate by 25%. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Legendary |source = |sell = 2330 [[Gold|G]] }}
'''Ice Headbands''' are [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessories]] in {{XC3}} and {{XC3FR|sublink}}. They increase the user's Critical Rate. {{clr}} {{xc3 stub}} {{fr stub}} [[Category:XC3 Accessories]] [[Category:XC3FR Accessories]]

[[File:Exile fortress(2).jpg|thumb|A variety of Ignas in the [[Exile Fortress]] ]] '''Ignas''' (Japanese: {{lang|ja|イグーナ}}, ''Igūna'') are a reptilian family of bipedal enemies in the {{XC|serieslink}}. Ignas are similar in appearance and may be related to [[Kromar]]s and [[Merigna]]s. They all have the same appearance, but different equipment, in {{XC}}, and vary in looks in {{XC2}}, where Ignas may be red or green and may have an orange frill on their head and neck, and in {{XC3}}.
== {{XC|-}} == Except for the [[Fiery Igna]]s who attack [[Colony 6]], Ignas are found exclusively in [[Satorl Marsh]]. The Fiery Ignas, at level 37, are the most powerful Igna. A group of [[Kindred Enemy|kindred]] Ignas can use [[Chain Attack (XC1)|Chain Attacks]].
The behaviour, adornments and social structure of Ignas strongly suggest they are an intelligent race, but they can still be harmed by the [[Monado]] unlike the [[Homs]], [[Nopon]] and [[High Entia]].
=== Normal Minor Enemies === * [[Barbaro Igna]] * [[Duel Igna (XC1)|Duel Igna]] * [[Ether Igna]] * [[Fighter Igna]] * [[Guard Igna]] * [[Mistol Igna]] * [[Shield Igna (XC1)|Shield Igna]]
=== Quest Exclusive Enemies === * [[Deluded Igna]] (during ''[[The Giants' Key]]'') * [[Fiery Igna]] (during ''[[Defend Colony 6 - Reptile]]'')
=== Unique Monsters === * [[Aggressive Cornelius]] * [[Cautious Balteid]] * [[Reckless Godwin]] * [[Tumultuous Felix]]
== {{XCFC|sub}} == === Normal Minor Enemies === * [[Barbaro Igna]] * [[Duel Igna (XC1)|Duel Igna]] * [[Ether Igna]] * [[Fighter Igna]]
=== Quest Exclusive Enemy === * [[Cutpurse Igna]] (during ''[[Priority Wunwun]]'')
=== Unique Monsters === * [[Deputy Seagal]] * [[Marquis Odesh]]
== {{XC2|-}} == Ignas can be found in the [[Kingdom of Uraya]] and [[Temperantia]]. Some of the high-level Ignas can be found riding [[Rhinon]]s.
=== Normal Minor Enemies === * [[Amost Igna]] * [[Archer Igna]] * [[Bagis Igna]] * [[Beat Igna]] * [[Boss Igna]] * [[Captain Igna]] * [[Duel Igna (XC2)|Duel Igna]] * [[Faros Igna]] * [[Flash Scout]] * [[Fort Igna]] * [[Gazzam Igna]] * [[Hooligan Igna]] * [[Mergen Igna]] * [[Norgam Igna]] * [[Raider Igna]] * [[Ranger Igna (XC2)|Ranger Igna]] * [[Razor Scout]] * [[Roiba Igna]] * [[Rowda Igna]] * [[Saber Igna]] * [[Shralk Igna]] * [[Shungle Igna]] * [[Snide Igna]] * [[Sparda Igna]] * [[Talent Runner]] * [[Tawa Igna]] * [[Telen Igna]] * [[Venal Igna]] (with [[Rhinon]]) * [[Vool Igna]] * [[Wall Igna]] * [[Whispering Igna]]

{{for|other uses|Immovable Gonzalez}} {{Infobox XC3 Enemy |name = Immovable Gonzalez |image = XC3-Gonzales.png |caption = Immovable Gonzalez |type = [[Gogol]] |movement = Ground
|area = [[High Maktha Wildwood]] ([[Gogols' Tree]]) |category = [[Unique Monster (XC3)|Unique Monster]] |level = 88 |detection = |spawntime = Anytime |respawn = Yes |exp = 4,394 |cp = 445 |sp = 5 |gold = 2,274 |hp = 6,595,000 |strength = 2,188 |healing = 748 |dexterity = 362 |agility = 309 |physdef = 10% |ethdef = -10% |critrate = 15% |guardrate-front = 5% |guardrate-side = 0% |guardrate-back = 0% }} '''Immovable Gonzalez''' (Japanese: 不動のゴンザレス, ''Fudō no Gonzaresu'') is a [[Unique Monster (XC3)|Unique Monster]] in {{XC3}}. It is a member of the [[Gogol]] family and can be found at level 88 at the [[Gogols' Tree]] in [[High Maktha Wildwood]]. The [[Wild Wave]] [[Battle Arts (XC3)|Art]] can be earned by the [[Soulhacker]] [[Class (XC3)|class]] for defeating it. == Resistances == {{XC3 Resistances |break = 90% |physdebuff = 25% |etherdebuff = Immune |knockback = Immune |blowdown = Immune }} {{clr}} == Challenge Battle Mode == {{Infobox XC3 Enemy |name = Immovable Gonzalez |image = |caption = Immovable Gonzalez |type = [[Gogol]] |movement = Ground |area = [[Land of Challenge (XC3)|Land of Challenge]] |category = [[Challenge Battle Enemy (XC3)|Challenge Battle Enemy]] |level = 110 |detection = |spawntime = During ''[[Primate Triumvirate]]'' |respawn = No |hp = 8,271,000 |strength = 2,556 |healing = 930 |dexterity = 457 |agility = 323 |physdef = 10% |ethdef = -10% |critrate = 5% |guardrate-front = 5% |guardrate-side = 0% |guardrate-back = 0% }} Immovable Gonzalez is fought at level 110 in the third wave of the ''[[Primate Triumvirate]]'' [[Challenge Battle Mode|challenge]]. {{clr}} == Trivia == * It shares its name with the [[Immovable Gonzalez (XC1)|Immovable]] [[Immovable Gonzalez (XC2)|Gonzalez]] [[Unique Monster (XC1)|Unique]] [[Unique Monster (XC2)|Monsters]] from {{XC}} and {{XC2}}. All three are high-level Gogol Unique Monsters, however those from previous games are level 90 instead of 88. Also, like the Immovable Gonzalez from {{XC2|-}}, it is found sleeping in a wooded area. * This is the first version of Immovable Gonzalez whose body isn't physically obstructing a path that leads somewhere else. Here, Gonzalez is located at a dead end and can be avoided entirely.
== Gallery == <gallery> Gogol's Tree.jpg Xc3 immovable gonzalez location.png Xc3 immovable gonzalez.png </gallery>
[[Category:XC3 Unique Monsters]] [[Category:Pentelas Region Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Level 86-90 Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Gogols]] [[Category:XC3 Enemy pages needing drops]]

{{Infobox XC3 Enemy |category = Unique Monster |name = Impish Langobard |image = XC3 Impish Langobard.png |caption = Impish Langobard |type = [[Gogol]] |level = 74 |area = [[Elaice Highway]] ([[Great Liente Shelf]]) |spawntime = Anytime |respawn = Yes |movement = Ground |detection = |exp = 3,243 |cp = 445 |sp = 5 |gold = 1,812 |hp = 4,174,800 |strength = 1,623 |healing = 634 |dexterity = 297 |agility = 257 |physdef = 10% |ethdef = -10% |critrate = 8% |guardrate-front = 5% |guardrate-side = 0% |guardrate-back = 0% }} '''Impish Langobard''' is a [[Unique Monster (XC3)|Unique Monster]] in {{XC3}}. It is a member of the [[Gogol]] family, and can be found at level 74 at the [[Great Liente Shelf]] on [[Elaice Highway]]. The [[Soulhacker#Enemy Skills|Non-Stop Barrage]] [[Skill (XC3)|Skill]] can be earned by the [[Soulhacker]] [[Class (XC3)|class]] by defeating it.
== Resistances == {{XC3 Resistances |break = 80% |physdebuff = 25% |etherdebuff = 85% |knockback = 100% |blowdown = 100% }} {{clr}} == Challenge Battle Mode == {{Infobox XC3 Enemy |name = Impish Langobard |image = |caption = Impish Langobard |type = [[Gogol]] |movement = Ground |area = [[Land of Challenge (XC3)|Land of Challenge]] |category = [[Challenge Battle Enemy (XC3)|Challenge Battle Enemy]] |level = 105 |detection = |spawntime = During ''[[Primate Triumvirate]]'' |respawn = No |hp = 5,018,450 |strength = 2,312 |healing = 889 |dexterity = 445 |agility = 314 |physdef = 10% |ethdef = -10% |critrate = 10% |guardrate-front = 5% |guardrate-side = 0% |guardrate-back = 0% }} Impish Langobard is fought at level 105 in the first wave of the [[Challenge Battle Mode|Challenge Battle]] ''[[Primate Triumvirate]]''. {{clr}}
== Gallery == <gallery> Impish langobard location.png Impish langobard.png </gallery>
